if(is_excute){
	ATTACK_ABS(Kind=FIGHTER_ATTACK_ABSOLUTE_KIND_THROW, ID=1, Damage=7.0, Angle=361, KBG=100, FKB=0, BKB=50, Hitlag=0.0, Unk=1.0, FacingRestrict=ATTACK_LR_CHECK_F, Unk=0.0, Unk=True, Effect=collision_attr_normal, SFXLevel=ATTACK_SOUND_LEVEL_S, SFXType=COLLISION_SOUND_ATTR_NONE, Type=ATTACK_REGION_THROW)
	ATTACK_ABS(Kind=FIGHTER_ATTACK_ABSOLUTE_KIND_CATCH, ID=1, Damage=4.0, Angle=361, KBG=50, FKB=0, BKB=0, Hitlag=0.0, Unk=1.0, FacingRestrict=ATTACK_LR_CHECK_F, Unk=0.0, Unk=True, Effect=collision_attr_normal, SFXLevel=ATTACK_SOUND_LEVEL_S, SFXType=COLLISION_SOUND_ATTR_NONE, Type=ATTACK_REGION_THROW)
	ATK_HIT_ABS(FIGHTER_ATTACK_ABSOLUTE_KIND_THROW, throw, FIGHTER_DIDDY_STATUS_MONKEY_FLIP_WORK_INT_TARGET_TASK, FIGHTER_DIDDY_STATUS_MONKEY_FLIP_WORK_INT_TARGET_HIT_GROUP, FIGHTER_DIDDY_STATUS_MONKEY_FLIP_WORK_INT_TARGET_HIT_NO)
	KineticModule__change_kinetic(FIGHTER_KINETIC_TYPE_AIR_STOP)
	CORRECT(GROUND_CORRECT_KIND_AIR)
	SA_SET(State=SITUATION_KIND_AIR)
	WorkModule__enable_transition_term(FIGHTER_DIDDY_STATUS_SPECIAL_S_TRANSITION_TERM_ID_GROUND)
	SET_SPEED(-1.5, 2.5)
}

0x17e76794fd
diddy.Data:
if(is_excute){
	ATTACK_ABS(Kind=FIGHTER_ATTACK_ABSOLUTE_KIND_THROW, ID=0, Damage=5.0, Angle=270, KBG=40, FKB=0, BKB=25, Hitlag=0.0, Unk=1.0, FacingRestrict=ATTACK_LR_CHECK_F, Unk=0.0, Unk=True, Effect=collision_attr_normal, SFXLevel=ATTACK_SOUND_LEVEL_S, SFXType=COLLISION_SOUND_ATTR_NONE, Type=ATTACK_REGION_THROW)
	ATTACK_ABS(Kind=FIGHTER_ATTACK_ABSOLUTE_KIND_CATCH, ID=0, Damage=2.0, Angle=361, KBG=50, FKB=0, BKB=0, Hitlag=0.0, Unk=1.0, FacingRestrict=ATTACK_LR_CHECK_F, Unk=0.0, Unk=True, Effect=collision_attr_normal, SFXLevel=ATTACK_SOUND_LEVEL_S, SFXType=COLLISION_SOUND_ATTR_NONE, Type=ATTACK_REGION_THROW)
	CHECK_FINISH_CAMERA(5, -5)
	FighterCutInManager__set_throw_finish_zoom_rate(ZoomRate=2.3)
	FighterCutInManager__set_throw_finish_offset(X=0, Y=-4, Z=0)
	ATK_HIT_ABS(FIGHTER_ATTACK_ABSOLUTE_KIND_THROW, throw, FIGHTER_DIDDY_STATUS_MONKEY_FLIP_WORK_INT_TARGET_TASK, FIGHTER_DIDDY_STATUS_MONKEY_FLIP_WORK_INT_TARGET_HIT_GROUP, FIGHTER_DIDDY_STATUS_MONKEY_FLIP_WORK_INT_TARGET_HIT_NO)
	KineticModule__change_kinetic(FIGHTER_KINETIC_TYPE_AIR_STOP)
	CORRECT(GROUND_CORRECT_KIND_AIR)
	SA_SET(State=SITUATION_KIND_AIR)
	WorkModule__enable_transition_term(FIGHTER_DIDDY_STATUS_SPECIAL_S_TRANSITION_TERM_ID_GROUND)
	SET_SPEED(1, 3.5)
}
